Writer: Michael Lesslie (screenplay by), Adam Cooper (screenplay by), Bill Collage (screenplay by)
Country: USA, France, UK, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malta
Title: Assassin's Creed
Actors: Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons, Brendan Gleeson
Plot: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.
